title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, the height of the label does not change immediately.
EB: The label should automatically adjust its height to accommodate the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label. 
2. Edit the font size of the label to '18 points'.
